description: Describes a data Grain sent via the a Query API websocket subscription
title: Query API data Grain

grain_type.description: Type of data contained within the 'grain' attribute's payload

source_id.description: Source ID of the Query API instance issuing the data Grain

flow_id.description: Subscription ID under the /subscriptions/ resource of the Query API

origin_timestamp.description: TAI timestamp at which this data Grain was generated in the format <ts_secs>:<ts_nsecs>

sync_timestamp.description: TAI timestamp at which this data Grain was generated in the format <ts_secs>:<ts_nsecs>

creation_timestamp.description: TAI timestamp at which this data Grain was generated in the format <ts_secs>:<ts_nsecs>

rate.description: Rate at which Grains will be received within this Flow (if applicable)

duration.description: Duration over which this Grain is valid or should be presented (if applicable)

type.description: Format classifier for the data contained in this payload

topic.description: Query API topic which has been subscribed to using this websocket

data.description: An array of changes which have occurred and are being passed to the subscription client

items.description: A single object identifying a change which has occurred under a particular API resource

path.description: ID of the resource which has undergone a change (may be a Node ID, Device ID etc.)

pre.description: Representation of the resource undergoing a change prior to the change occurring. Omitted if the resource didn't previously exist.

post.description: Representation of the resource undergoing a change after the change had occurred. Omitted if the resource no longer exists.
